comments.author: YoussefUWN

comments.text:
Science hack:
Take 1 cup of industrial strength drain cleaner, 1 cup of water, 1/2 cups 
of salt, and 1 cup of peroxide, 1/4 cups corn starch, yellow dye. an etchy 
sketch, and a sharp knife.
Add together the drain cleaner, the cup of water, the half cup of salt, and 
the peroxide, and mix them together in a bowl. Mix until combined. Take the 
knife and cut open the etchy sketch. Dump the sandy metal contents into the 
microwave safe bowl. Put bowl in microwave for 5 minutes. Take out 
carefully, the contents will be hot! Add in the yellow dye and let it dry! 
this will make an ultra shimmery liquid that can be used to paint various 
things! Make sure you use gloves and do not touch the drain cleaner with 
your bare hands until it is finished in the microwave! HAVE FUN!!!!﻿
